data.text: @mantistrader @DonTramp10 @nzherald Glad we're on the same picture then

@Col_world49 @nzherald Peaceful is not abusing kids on their way to school, for wearing masks 🤷🏽‍♂️ you guys are the joke !! Saying it’s peaceful, Nazi signs displayed, saying you have the Iwi support, Raw sewage in to storm drains, breaking in to a Marae, Blah, Blah & Blah !! Bad look !!
@heywood_nic @nzherald 💯 Agree, should have been sorted on day one, but some clever muppet thought sprinklers and loud music was the fun thing to do.
@stagnant16 @nzherald Looking inward 🤷🏽‍♂️ and I’m get a strong feeling of “Take responsibility for your own actions” before asking others to look at what actions they made !! 👎🏾
@andrew_schirmer @nzherald Ummm - Coster a Labour Party puppet, so yes.

@maggie45146616 @nzherald What a stupid statement. So because there are countries that have less freedom than we do, we shouldn't complain about ours being eroded? 7 idiots agreed with you that's worrying.
@PetherStephen @DonTramp10 @nzherald Hey misguided fool her dad isn't the Police commissoner

@PetherStephen @nzherald Actually she didn't because the NZ police have constabulary independence and the Commissoner makes the decisions and they have no allegiance to the PM its to the Queen. You don't give a toss about the violence of the protestors though do you
